name: Slashy Ninja demo
description:
This is a little demo of the game i'm working on, Slashy Ninja.

It is by no means a finished game, more like a collection of all the things i've learned so far in game development with Unity.

Hope you have fun playing, let me know in the comments or tweet me @Mathcong_

Controls:

So far only keyboard and mouse is supported.

Credits:

The background music is made by Connor Schumer, check his awesome music out at: 

https://twitter.com/ConnorSchumer 

https://www.connorschumer.com/

https://soundcloud.com/connor-schumer

The sound effects are downloaded from https://freesound.org/
